summary: Makes the Artifact much more worth having to go out and do a hard quest to recive
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn has not been released yet so this mod does not require it yet
requires skyrim.esm
does not require an update yet



Updates
-------------------------------
I will not be working on this file for a couple of weeks so do not expect an update soon.  I will be working another mod that will be released hopefully before dragonborn. After dragonborn comes out i hope to have v1 released. 

v2
will contain new texures for dragonpriest mask in 
2048*2048
4096*4096
Release sometime in april


All masks provide more armor and protection.



v1.0.0beta
______________________________

Dragon Priest Masks
_______________________





Hevnoraak
		Armor 25
		Weight 15
		Value 1000
		Resist Desies 100%
		Resist Posion 100%
		Resist Magica 25%
	Iron Mask


Konahric
		Armor 30
		Weight 20
		Value 5000
		Konahric Privladge
		Fortifty health, magicka, and stamina 50 points
	Gold Mask


Krosis
		Armor 23
		Weight 7
		Value 750
		Fortify Archery, Sneak, and lockpicking 50%
	Bronze Mask


Morokie
		Armor 23
		Weight 10
		Value 800
		Fortify Mackica Regeneration 250%
	Moonstone Mask


Nahkriin
		Armor 27
		Weight 17
		Value 1500
		Fortify Mackica by 100 points
		Fortiby Destruction and Restoration 50%
	Ebony Mask


Otar
		Armor 25
		Weight 15
		Value 2000
		Resist fire, frost, shock 50%
	Malchamite Mask


Rahgot
		Armor 27
		Weight 18
		Value 1000
		Fortify stamina 100 points
		Stamina regenerates 100% faster


Volkun
		Armor 25
		Weight 15
		Value 1000
		Fortify Conjuration, Illusion, Alteration 50%
	Steel Mask


Volsung
		Armor 23
		Weight 10
		Value 750
		Fortify Carryweight 250 points
		Waterbreathing
		Fortify barter, speechcraft 25%
	Corundum Mask











When dragonborn is released

		Weight 15
		Value 2000

		Walking Nightmare 50 points

volendrung

		damage health 25

		Weight 35

		posion cloack 15

		Weight 10

		Regenerate magicka 100% faster

		weight 1
		Value 1000

		Weight 1

		Weight 15

v1.0.0.0.0Alfa
________________________
Light armor ones offer:
     25 base armor(more than daedric helmet)
     worth 500 gold(not that anyone would want to sell them)
Heavy armor one offer
     30 base armor
     worth 1000 gold
Krosis is worth 5000 because it is the hardest to get. It also provides 35 base armor rating. 


The enchantments are changed to the following on these masks:
krosis=fortify lockpicking 50
	fortify marksman 50
	fortify sneak 50

Volsung=waterbreathing
	fortify barter 50
	fortify carryweight 100

Dark Sacrifice=fortify magicka 100
		fortiby destruction 50
		fortify restoration 50

Otar=resist fire, frost, and shock 50%

Morokia=shout recovery 20% faster
	magick regen 150% faster

Volkun=fortify conjuation, illusion, and alteration by 50


If the mask is not listed it means that its encantment was not changed. 


??????: i do not know what mask this is, the creation kit did not say for some reason. 


Becasue i have not texures yet and they take a really long time to make you should check out this mod for really nice, high quality texutres. 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15052




Permission 
Please do not use this file for anything other than to make your game better. If you have an idea leave in in the comment section or send me a message through skyrimnexus. 
If you wish to modify this mod in any way please just ask, i will probably say yes.
If you want to make a plugin for this mod to another cool mod such as Skyre then make it and if you want send me a message and i will post a link in the description.
author: SamtheGamer22
